findings.title: PRESENCE OF OVERPOWERED ROLE
findings.description: The overpowered owner (i.e., the person who has too much power) is a project design where the contract is tightly coupled to their owner (or owners); only they can manually invoke critical functions.

findings.title: LOOP CONSUMING EXCESSIVE GAS
findings.description: The function contains a loop that consumes excessive gas due to its dependency on array.length, which can lead to transactions never being confirmed if it exceeds the block gas limit.
